item.title: Omegle: 我如何关闭危险的聊天网站
item.description: "Alice" speaks exclusively to the BBC after her successful lawsuit against Omegle forced it offline.

item.title: 荷兰选举：选民在胶着的角逐中选择新领导者
item.description: The head of the centre right, Dilan Yesilgöz, is tipped to become the Netherlands' first female PM.

item.title: 微软提供与OpenAI所有员工的工资匹配
item.description: The tech giant offers jobs to any workers who want to leave over Sam Altman's sacking.

item.title: 中国：人权观察指责北京关闭和摧毁清真寺
item.description: The crackdown is part of a "systematic effort" to curb the practice of Islam, Human Rights Watch says.

item.title: 感恩节旅行：暴风雨延误数千航班
item.description: More than 4,800 flights were behind schedule as rain and strong winds buffeted the US east coast.

item.title: 加拿大QAnon“女王”离开了村庄，但她并没有走远。
item.description: Romana Didulo and her band of followers have left a Canadian village that wanted them out.

item.title: 朝鲜声称在之前的几次失败之后，成功发射了间谍卫星。
item.description: Its recent success comes as Russia had earlier offered Pyongyang help with its space programme.

item.title: 币安首席执行官赵长鹏承认洗钱罪名
item.description: Changpeng Zhao will also step down as chief executive of the world's largest crypto-exchange.

item.title: Four Las Vegas teens charged with murder in schoolmate's beating death
item.description: Las Vegas police say Jonathan Lewis Jr was beaten to death over a set of headphones stolen from him.

item.title: 美国法院撤回关键选举权保护措施
item.description: Only the US attorney general, not individuals, can appeal racist voting practices, a federal court finds.

item.title: 刚果-布拉柴维尔踩踏事件：在军队招募活动中，数十人丧生
item.description: At least 37 people have died in a crush during an army recruitment drive, Brazzaville officials say.

item.title: 视频据称显示A$AP Rocky持枪
item.description: The rapper will stand trial on charges that he fired a pistol in a feud with a former childhood friend in 2021.

item.title: 乌塔拉坎德邦隧道坍塌：首个视频现身，印度被困工人
item.description: The 41 workers have been trapped in an under-construction tunnel in northern India since 12 November.

item.title: 超过60万人因索马里洪水而流离失所
item.description: The number of displaced people by the rains in Somalia has gone up by 100,000 in just one week, bringing the number to close to 650,000 people.

item.title: Nicki Minaj回应尼日利亚粉丝对巡演场馆的抱怨
item.description: A fan of the rapper is overwhelmed at her responding after asking Minaj to add Nigeria to her tour.

item.title: 黎巴嫩总理表示，以色列的袭击导致记者丧生
item.description: Two journalists and two other civilians are killed as exchanges of fire intensify along the border.

item.title: Yahya Sinwar: 谁是加沙地带的哈马斯领导人？
item.description: Thousands of Israeli troops are trying to find the man who heads the organisation's political wing.

item.title: BBC评估以色列公布的人质和隧道的影像资料
item.description: BBC Verify assesses footage of a tunnel and hostages released by Israel to prove Hamas used Gaza's al-Shifa hospital as a command centre.

item.title: 美国表示以色列人质交易“比以往更接近”
item.description: A deal to release Israeli hostages held in Gaza is "closer than ever before", a senior US official says.

item.title: 观看：以色列政治家与加沙人质家属的会议陷入喧闹之中
item.description: Politicians have been contemplating the death penalty for 7 October attackers, but some hostages' relatives say this could have repercussions.

item.title: Israeli tanks surround north Gaza's Indonesian Hospital
item.description: At least 12 Palestinians are reported to have been killed by Israeli fire at the hospital overnight.

item.title: 以色列表示，闭路电视录像显示人质被带到加沙医院。
item.description: Israel says the video - which the BBC has not verified - shows captives were taken to al-Shifa on 7 October.

item.title: 自从哈马斯袭击以来，约旦河西岸地区在以色列的严格封锁之下。
item.description: In the fortified H2 area of Hebron, Palestinian residents are being forced off the street at gunpoint.

item.title: 哈马斯人质：哈马斯从以色列夺走的人质故事
item.description: From elderly grandparents to young children, these are the people known to have been taken captive.

item.title: 封锁如何激发对月经贫困的斗争
item.description: Inside a project tackling period poverty, with an army of thousands of volunteers across the world.

item.title: 视频显示车内被一只被困的熊肆意破坏
item.description: Wildlife officials in Colorado say the animal likely entered the vehicle searching for food.

item.title: 拜登在土耳其仪式上把布兰妮和泰勒搞混了。
item.description: The US president pardoned 'Liberty' and 'Bell' ahead of Thanksgiving, and joked about his age.

item.title: 阿尔巴尼亚：反对派政治家在议会点燃彩色烟雾弹
item.description: The smoke flares and fire were part of an attempt to try and stop the chamber voting on the 2024 budget.

item.title: 罗莎琳·卡特作为第一夫人的不平凡人生时刻
item.description: Former First Lady of the US and wife of ex-President Jimmy Carter, has died at the age of 96.

item.title: 撤离的早产儿抵达加沙医院
item.description: The babies were moved from al-Shifa hospital to receive urgent care in a neonatal intensive care unit.

item.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特在里约音乐会上显得气喘吁吁。
item.description: Video showed the singer gasping for air in between songs during her performance in the stifling heat.

item.title: 我们距离解决JFK的暗杀案还更近吗？
item.description: Recent revelations by an ex-Secret Service agent throw new light onto a now 60-year-old shooting.

item.title: 气候变化：村民们建造100英尺高的冰塔
item.description: The people of Ladakh in the Indian Himalayas have used maths to solve a water shortage.

item.title: 罗希特•莎玛：印度队长，虽然输掉了板球世界杯，但赢得了人们的心。
item.description: Rohit Sharma led a cricket team that was undefeated until the final but couldn't cross the last hurdle.

item.title: 为什么肯尼亚-乌干达的石油争议引发了地区的紧张情绪
item.description: Landlocked Uganda has accused Kenyan middlemen of inflating petrol prices by up to 58%.

item.title: 理查德·腾格：谁是币安的新老板？
item.description: Richard Teng rapidly climbed the ranks after joining the world's largest crypto-exchange two years ago.

item.title: 为什么特朗普在爱荷华州的竞争对手们仍然认为他们可以赢得胜利
item.description: Despite trailing far behind in the polls, the former president's rivals are spending millions. Why?

item.title: OpenAI如何为混乱创造了完美的条件
item.description: The company's idiosyncratic structure may be behind the sweeping changes seen in recent days.

item.title: 荷兰选举承诺激烈竞争和政治新时代
item.description: Two new leaders are among the front-runners, and one is tipped to be the first female Dutch PM.
